        Parameters:
        host - Hostname or IP address of the SessionServer/Host
        port - the port number the SessionServer/Host is running on

      • sendData

        protected void sendData(short[] out,
                        int outLen)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        This method provides outbound communication to the Telnet host.
        Parameters:
        out[] - an array of shorts, representing the data to be sent to the host.
        outLen - the number of valid bytes in the out array
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • setSessionData

        protected void setSessionData(java.lang.String key,
                              java.lang.String value)

      • run

        public void run()
        The 'thread code' for this class. Consumers need to invoke this method to begin the communications process. It will run indefinitely until the socket read returns -1 (Host disconnected) or disconnect is called. Usage Thread t = new Thread(RWTelnet instance);
        t.run;         Any problems encountered (IOException, Host Disconnect) will be transmitted back to the consumer via the RWTnAction interface.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • setEncryption

        protected void setEncryption(boolean encryption)
        Turns the encryption on and off
        Parameters:
        encryption - True = on False = off
